result.title: NRG Energy: Power Demand Tailwinds Keep This Utility Stock A Compelling Buy

The company's topline is expected to benefit from surging power demand in Texas, major data center deals, and robust smart home adoption in the quarters ahead. Continued pricing strength and better execution should support margins in FY25 and beyond.

result.text: HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) marked its 18th annual positiveNRG Impact Week by mobilizing thousands of employees across 41 communities in the United States and Canada to fight food insecurity. From September 1519, the NRG team came together to pack, sort, and prepare over 2 million meals for local nonprofits serving individuals and families in need.
